summary: Epic soundtracks from games and movies.
descriptionHtml:
Epic soundtrack from games and movies that i gathered around the net and converted to xwm files.
I personally chose them and hope you will like it. Makes the game even more epic than it was. 
Just download and try to listen to a few songs and try it.

To install just overwrite the music folder in Skyrim/Data/
Make a backup of the music folder in case you don\'t like mine (i doubt it).

Also it\'s my first posted \"mod\".
If anyone wants to use this go ahead.
Hope you guys like it.
And I would like to specify one thing: don\'t play the game without ThuuMic - Real life dragon shouts ( http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5626 )  :D
author: Pamely
